origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinTechAPI.get_latest_report', 'description': 'This function retrieves the latest report on financial technology development in a specified country.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of report, e.g., financial_technology, market_analysis.'}, {'name': 'country', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The country for which the report is requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The latest report on financial technology development.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinTechAPI.get_latest_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'reportType'是'financial_technology', 'country'是'China'.
